main event: Coast Guardsmen reported seeing a UFO near Surfside, Texas, on 20 March 1966, coinciding with a local power outage.
interesting points: Multiple witnesses reported very bright lights in two nearby houses that abruptly ceased while a blue flash was seen,One of the witnesses described the UFO as emitting a pulsating 'eerie' white glow,Another witness claimed a large object with an orange glow was seen rising slowly before speeding away,Two separate objects were later observed shooting up from the ground without leaving a trail,The UFOs and power failure were reported to occur within a short timeframe, heightening the intrigue of the sighting.
sighted object: a large UFO emitting an orange glow and other unidentified objects
witness description: Coast Guardsmen from the USCGC LEGARE, including John R. Weitlich and Glenn A. Mushett.
